oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General Joseph Wheeler circular
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Circular directing commanding officers to forward "without delay complete reports of the Killed wounded and taken prisoners of their respective commands from the time the enemy crossed the Tenn[essee] River to the 10th of October." Order was signed by Wheeler's Adj. General, Maj. Burford as well as an another signature that is not clear. This appears to be the copy of the order sent to General John H. Kelly, one of Wheeler's division commanders.
